name: I Know How To Free Them
name_original: I Know How To Free Them
description:
There are characters hiding in the novels we read. They are ones the authors didn’t believe in, or were scared of somehow, and they are hiding for this reason. But we need them—they are truer than the ones actually used in the story—and also, I know how to free them .

Suggested price $2.00. No minimum price.
